snippet: The challenge for the United States is to strengthen alliances and readiness in the Pacific region, while not antagonizing China more than necessary.
abstract: United States is strengthening its alliances and expanding its military exercises in Asia-Pacific region, but defense policy experts criticize Obama administration for mainly repackaging policies begun under previous administration; Pentagon says it is managing tensions with China while devoting crucial new resources and attention to region.
lead_paragraph: The challenge for the United States is to strengthen alliances and readiness in the Pacific region, while not antagonizing China more than necessary.

headline.seo: U.S. Military’s New Focus on Asia Becomes Clearer
headline.main: Words and Deeds Show Focus of the American Military on Asia
headline.print_headline: Words and Deeds Show Focus Of the American Military on Asia
